field.expiredAt.description: The expiration time of the application.

button.goDocument.description: Button text that takes the user to the document page when clicked.

button.goCredentials.description: Button text that takes the user to the credentials page when clicked.

button.buyMore.description: Button text that takes the user to the buy more page when clicked.

button.createOrder.description: Button text that takes the user to the create order page when clicked.

button.custom.description: Button text that takes the user to the custom page when clicked.

button.query.description: Button text that takes the user to the query page when clicked.

button.usage.description: Button text that takes the user to the usage records page when clicked.

field.remainingAmount.description: The remaining quota of the application.

field.usedAmount.description: The used quota of the application.

field.allowConsumeGlobal.description: Whether to allow the consumption of global balance when the exclusive balance is insufficient.

field.traceId.description: The trace ID of an API call for the application of the API service, do not translate, keep as 'Trace ID'.

field.shouldPayPrice.description: The final price of the application.

field.api.description: This is an online service that provides services to users through an API.

field.proxy.description: This is an online service that provides services to users through an HTTP proxy (for data transmission).

field.package.description: The package represents different pricing packages, such as $100 for 10,000 points, $200 for 20,000 points.

field.extraPrice.description: The additional price that the user should pay for the application.

message.alreadyApplied.message: You have already applied for this service, please check the console.
message.alreadyApplied.description: Message displayed to the user when they have already applied for this service.

message.applySuccessfully.description: Message displayed to the user when they have successfully applied for this service.

message.notApplied.message: Welcome to use our service, we will give you free trial quota, please click the button below to start immediately.
message.notApplied.description: Message displayed to the user when they have not yet applied for this service.

message.globalBalanceBuyDescription.message: The points from this recharge are global balance and can be used for any service.
message.globalBalanceBuyDescription.description: Message displayed to the user when they recharge global balance.

message.yourApplication.description: Message displayed to the user regarding their application.

message.unverified.message: You need to complete real-name authentication before you can apply for this service.
message.unverified.description: Message displayed to the user when they have not completed real-name authentication.

message.goVerify.description: Message displayed to the user when they have not completed real-name authentication.

message.requiredParameter.description: Message displayed to the user when they have not entered required parameters.

message.example.description: Message displayed to the user when they have not entered required parameters.

message.applicationSelection.message: Here are the packages you are currently applying for or have purchased. You can choose any package to continue using the service.
message.applicationSelection.description: Message displayed to the user when they need to select an application.

message.createCredentialSuccessfully.description: Message displayed to the user when they successfully create a credential.

message.readPolicy.description: Message displayed to the user when they have read and agreed to the policy.

message.policy.description: Message displayed to the user when they have read and agreed to the policy.

message.notAgreePolicy.message: You have not agreed to the Data Technology Service Usage Agreement
message.notAgreePolicy.description: Message displayed to the user when they have not agreed to the policy.

message.welcome.description: Message displayed to the user when they confirm the service application.

message.rotateCredential.description: Message displayed to the user when they reset the key.

message.rotateCredentialConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to reset the key? It cannot be recovered after resetting.
message.rotateCredentialConfirm.description: Message displayed to the user when they confirm the key reset.

message.idDoesNotExist.description: Message displayed to the user when the application does not exist.

message.rotateCredentialSuccessfully.description: Message displayed to the user when the key reset is successful.

message.rotateCredentialFailed.message: Key reset failed, please contact support
message.rotateCredentialFailed.description: Message displayed to the user when the key reset fails.

message.fetchFailed.message: Failed to fetch applications, please try again later.
message.fetchFailed.description: Prompt when fetching the application list fails.

message.updateFailed.description: Message displayed to the user when the update fails.

message.updateSuccessfully.description: Message displayed to the user when the update is successful.

message.neverExpire.description: Message displayed to the user when the application never expires.

title.buyService.description: Title of the page when the user wants to purchase a service.

title.globalBuy.description: Title of the page when the user wants to recharge the universal balance.

title.applicationRemainingCount.description: Title of the page when the user wants to modify the application quantity.

title.manageApplication.description: Title of the page when the user wants to manage applications.

title.applicationBalance.description: Message displayed to the user when they view the application balance.

title.count.description: Title of the summary card for application count.

message.countDescription.message: Manage your exclusive applications and universal balance here.
message.countDescription.description: Auxiliary description under the application count card.

title.globalBalance.description: Message displayed to the user when they view the universal balance.

message.globalBalanceDescription.message: The universal balance is available for consumption by eligible applications.
message.globalBalanceDescription.description: Description text for the universal balance card.
